TEXT.TITLE: AMERICAN REALTY <ARB> SETS RECORD DATE FOR OFFER
TEXT.BODY: American Realty Trust said its board has set April 3 as the record date for its previously announced rights offering, and the rights will be issued on April 6 and expire May 22. Shareholders will be able to subscribe for 1.25 shares for each share held, at a price of 3.75 dlrs per share. Reuter
